qas.question: What major airport is located to the southwest of Delhi?
Approximately how many passengers used Indira Gandhi Airport from 2012-2013?
How much money did Terminal 3 of Indira Gandhi International Airport cost to construct?
How many passengers use Terminal 3 of Indira Gandhi Airport each year?
What year was construction of Terminal 3 of Indira Gandhi airport finished?

context: <a0_0>Indira Gandhi International Airport<a0_0/>, situated to the southwest of Delhi, is the main gateway for the city's domestic and international civilian air traffic. In 2012-13, the airport was used by more than <a1_0>35 million<a1_0/> passengers, making it one of the busiest airports in South Asia. Terminal 3, which cost <a2_0>₹96.8 billion<a2_0/> (US$1.4 billion) to construct between 2007 and <a4_0>2010<a4_0/>, handles an additional <a3_0>37 million<a3_0/> passengers annually.
